@Nate Simpson

What did you do over these 3 years of delays delays delays if in the end early access release will not have even a science tree?????

I’m not a dev, but as I understand it, they implemented a lot more stuff than what was in the original development plans. And the pandemic (you’re probably aware of it) made everyone have to leave the office and start working from home for a while, which slowed down development a bit.

    If you compare the gameplay footage that was released three years ago with the most recent footage from the PC gaming showcase, and watch the development documentaries on the KSP official YouTube channel, I think that should answer your questions.

   They’re trying to polish every feature before releasing it. They’ve obviously developed career mode at this point, they just want to get rid of all the little problems with it before releasing it into the wild.
Seeing as there’s many other threads that already answer this question, we can wrap this one up.
